verses.verse: O praise <WH1984> the LORD <WH3068>, all ye nations <WH1471>: praise <WH7623> him, all ye people <WH523>.
For his merciful <WH2617> kindness <WH2617> is great <WH1396> toward us: and the truth <WH571> of the LORD <WH3068> endureth for ever <WH5769>. Praise <WH1984> ye the LORD <WH3050>.
